channel.title: How do i make a website for my rsc server?
channel.description: I'm sorry if I'm a noob asking this but how do i make a website for my rsc server so people can register their accounts? The servers up and running, and i already port forwarded. I'm using Divine Pk as my source. there is only one way for people to register and that's either if they ask me or i say my ip so they can register. But its obviously better if I don't tell em my ip :p so please help.

item.title: How do i make a website for my rsc server?
item.dc:creator: @Jpark Jpark
item.description:
@Jpark wrote:

[quote=“martinfin, post:8, topic:340496”]I’m pretty sure How to make a website was on this page:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309101.0.html[/quote]
Thanks for trying to help, but im not using RSCD v25, im using Divine Pk.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a website for my rsc server?
item.dc:creator: @Jpark Jpark
item.description:
@Jpark wrote:

Why? If he’s managed to get SQL setup and his server is working then that’s the hard bit done. Using text files is just idiotic and using NOOBScape is even more idiotic unless you literally have no-idea what you’re doing and just want everything handed to you.

Divine pk seems more easy for me. I just need to put a website up so people can register, which i have no idea how to do that. I don’t understand why divine pk worked for port forwarding and not noobscape.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a website for my rsc server?

item.title: How do i make a website for my rsc server?
item.dc:creator: @pompio pompio
item.description:
@pompio wrote:

[quote=“elyad, post:5, topic:340496”]Divine was based of Demonik Kryptix, Uses .Sql DB

Use DynDNS.com, Create yourself a domain so people can connect via the site to register Characters.

PM if you need a hand, Im bored at the moment.[/quote]

He wanted to host it but it would be better for him to start off with easyrsc. (noobscape v3)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a website for my rsc server?

item.title: How do i make a website for my rsc server?

item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Divine was based of Demonik Kryptix, Uses .Sql DB

Use DynDNS.com, Create yourself a domain so people can connect via the site to register Characters.

PM if you need a hand, Im bored at the moment.
